(227)  wishala magi naukawak lankawata ! (227)  jodu 2000 k babala illa paththini mani yadithi (227)  aagamika nayakayan ekathu weyi ! (226)  birinda niwase sitiyadi ganikawak soya giya wigneshwaran! (226)  eekabaddha wipakshaye pirisak yoshitha balanna yayi (226)  dennek porakayata! (226)  nawa wyawasthawa sakas wiya yuthu aakaraya gana jawipe kiyayi (225)  obama awasanwarata jathiya amathayi (225)  masthanta aaradhana kale natha, aaradhana karanneda natha - rishad badiyurdin (225)  harishna sisuwiyawata purna sahayogaya ! (225)  madakalapuwe pongal! (224)  araliyagaha mandiraya dakwa pada yathrawak! (224)  lankiya ka්ridakayin 16k ayi.pi.el. wendesiyata ! (224)  sushma swaraj diwayinata ! (224)  sewaka hingayak nisa thapal katayuthu pramadayi ! (224)  sushma swaraj anidda diwayinata ! (223)  deshapalana wisandumak labanodunnahoth eya demala janathawata wenwayama sandaha anumathiya labadimak wanu atha (223)  puthage kondaya kapuwayi guruwarayata erehiwa piya manawa himikam yayi (223)  aluthgamadi wideshiya tharuniyak abhirahas lesa miya yayi ! (222)  nidahas dinaya wenuwen sirakaruwan 606 denekuta janapathi samawa ! (222)  kalani gange mala sirurak paweyi ! (222)  mahindodaya widyagara wanchawa gana soyanna  guru sewa sangamaya (222)  loka guwan widuli dinaya ada samare (222)  marana sahathika ho wandi mudal anawashyaya (222)  uthuru palath sabhawe palaka parshawaye nayakaya yana sudusukama uthuru palath pradhana amathyawaraya ahimikaragena atha! (222)  aandukrama wyawastha mandalaya path kirime yojanawa ada (23) wiwadayata.. (222)  aandukrama wyawasthawa sanshodhanayata ek dina wadamuluwak ! (222)  hamudawa mathara ginna palanaya karayi ! (221)  lowa palanaya kala damilayin warthamanaye mardhaniya grahanayakata ! (221)  minneriye tharunaya thallu kalada?

agga maha panditha madihe panynyasiha mahanayaka swaminwahanse anusmaranaya karamin thelijjawila samarasinharamaye idikaranu labana themahal godanangillata adhara pinisa pawathwanu labana “sandhaniya“ sangitha rathriya ada (11) paswaru 6.30 ta thelijjawila madhya maha widyalayiya shrawanagarayedi pawathwe.thelijjawila samarasinharamaye wiharadhipathi diddenipotha sumedha himiyange anushasakathwayen pawathwena mema sangitha rathriya prawina gayana shilpi dayan witharana mahatha wisin meheyawanu labayi.me awasthawata mathi amathiwarun wana dalas alahapperuma, mahinda yapa abewardhana, lakshman yapa abewardhana, wijaya dahanayaka, manganaguma sabhapathi kinsli ranawaka mahathwaru pradhana aaradhithayo lesa ekwethi..
ese wanne ayi da kiyana ekata thawamath kawuruth piliganna wiyuktha kathawak naha.
mahapare eyala ayithin illala pelapali yannatharam meka wasangathayak wela.
